verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Do right
'til the stars fall,
Do right
'til the last call,

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Do right
when there's no one else
to stand by you.

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
Do right
when you're all alone
Do right
though it's never known

verse.name: c1d
verse.lines:
Do right
since you love the Lord
Do right, do right.

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
From the very start
have purpose in your heart,
To do what's right and never question why.

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Never count the cost
though everything
seems lost;
The price of doing right
is sometimes high.

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Right is always right,
and wrong is always wrong,
And we must learn to separate the two.

verse.name: v2b
